title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers to talk with Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM & embeddings in chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, PDF, RAG, multi-user) similar to ChatGPT interface.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API for Rails & scripting.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI chat client with syntax highlighting, history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in production RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Convert & push Hugging Face models into Ollama Modelfile format with one command.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for deploying Ollama with Docker, K8s, GPU, OpenAI-compat, etc.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with async options & interceptors.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for typed, async interaction with Ollama’s REST endpoints.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & persistence support.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app with admin UI for managing Ollama models & chat sessions.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama in GenServer processes for fault-tolerant chats.
